name: 埃杰·厄兹迪基奇
name_full: 埃杰·厄兹迪基奇 Ece Özdikici
introduction: Ece Özdikici was born in Izmir. She is graduated from Izmir Anatolian High School Painting Department, Mimar Sinan University State Conservatory Theater Acting Department. While studying at the conservatory, she worked as the assistant for Prof. Dr. Zeliha Berksoy in the company of Dostlar Tiyatrosu. She graduated from the university by playing the character Polly in "Threepenny Opera". She completed her MA degree in Film and Drama Graduate Program at Kadir Has University.Her professional acting career began with the role of Young Girl in "The Good Person in Szechwan" in Bakirkoy Municipal Theatre. After that, she won the audition by Istanbul State Theatre for "A Midsummer Night's Dream" and played Hermia. In the next season, she gave life to Laurie, a rebellious high school student in the play called "Dalga"(The Wave) by Don Quixote Productions Theatre which she enjoyed much being in. In 2008, with the role of Laurie, she received her first awards in theatre: Afife Jale New Generation Special Prize at Theatre - VIII. Lions Kerem Yilmazer Young Talent Prize.In 2010, Istanbul Municipal Theatre announced an audition for Juliet in Romeo and Juliet. Ece Ozdikici won the audition and played Juliet between 2010-2012. With her performance in the play, she was honored with the nomination for Sadri Alisik Best Actress. These are the awards Ece Ozdikici won with Romeo and Juliet.
